Package ChessGame.Figure.ChessPieces.Rook

Class Rook

java.lang.Object
ChessGame.Figure.Figure
ChessGame.Figure.ChessPieces.Rook.Rook
All Implemented Interfaces:
IntFigure
Direct Known Subclasses:
Queen
public class Rook extends Figure
The Rook class represents a rook chess piece.

    • Rook

      public Rook(String name, String color, char LocationX, int LocationY, IntChessBoard chessboard)
      Constructs a rook with the specified name, color, initial position, and chessboard.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the rook
      color - the color of the rook
      LocationX - the initial column position of the rook
      LocationY - the initial row position of the rook
      chessboard - the chessboard on which the rook is placed
